channel.title: 667/711 changing home?
channel.description: how do u change your home area on a 667/711?

item.title: 667/711 changing home?
item.dc:creator: @extramax extramax
item.description:
@extramax wrote:

This is Boring , Please If You Cant Even Change A Home Location Dont Start A Rsps Just Play A Server,
So Yeh , Open up Your settings.java

thats for start location now for respawning

ul see a code like this public static final WorldTile RESPAWN_PLAYER_LOCATION = new WorldTile(3164,3488,0)
change the coords
hope this helpâ€™d .

item.title: 667/711 changing home?
item.dc:creator: @thakillah thakillah
item.description:
@thakillah wrote:

Go to src>som>rs Open settings.java and search for.

This is home location

Code (Java): [Select] public static final WorldTile START_PLAYER_LOCATION = new WorldTile(3094,3502,0); 3094 = xcoords 3502 = ycoords

Now for respawning location in the same file search for.

Code (Java): [Select] public static final WorldTile RESPAWN_PLAYER_LOCATION = new WorldTile(3094,3502, 0); same as above

3094 = xcoords 3502 = ycoords

tut by shabba

Read full topic
